title: #245 - Nate Bargatze, Sean Patton, & ME
description:
Comedians Nate Bargatze & Sean Patton DAY DRINK with me in Nashville to talk about not wanting to have sex with kids, our greatest Dave Attell stories, we do a waitstaff raffle, and a woman who had breast cancer, who I did horrible "breast cancer" crowd work with once in Cincinnati, shows up to tells her side of my breast cancer crowd work story!

To Follow me on..

Twitter: https://twitter.com/bertkreischer

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BertKreischer

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/bertkreischer/?hl=en

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/user/Akreischer

This episode is brought to you by Blue Apron to get Three Free MEALS w/ Free Shipping go to https://www.blueapron.com/bertcast 

Check out this episode!
